Pre-Game Insights: India will play their final Super 8 match against Australia, a team that beat them in the ODI World Cup final held in India last year.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played on June 24, 2024, with the proceedings scheduled to kickstart at 20:00 hours IST.
India will play Australia in their final Super 8 game of the T20 World Cup 2024.
The match will be hosted at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in Gros Islet, Saint Lucia.
Others: Virat Kohli has been the highest run scorer against Australia in T20Is, with over 794 runs at a batting average of 52.93, which includes 8 half-centuries.
